title: Tempt Me
description: Author Note: This anthology has been discontinued and the rights to the stories have returned to the individual authors.Indulge your wildest fantasies with this steamy romance anthology. Dive into paranormal, and fantasy realms; immerse yourself in contemporary and historical worlds. Fall for an underworld god, make a deal with the Angel of Death, get sexy with a satyr, and be voracious with a vampire. (F/M,/M/M, and F/F). There's something to satisfy every craving in this selection of short stories from three award-winning authors of erotic romance. Let the temptation begin…  Content warning: These stories contain explicit sexual content and are not suitable for young readers.
author: Karen Lieversz
